brands.name: Apple
brands.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company specializing in consumer electronics, software, and online services.

brands.name: Samsung
brands.description: Samsung is a South Korean multinational conglomerate known for its electronics, including smartphones, televisions, and home appliances.

brands.name: Google
brands.description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products.

brands.name: OnePlus
brands.description: OnePlus is a Chinese smartphone manufacturer that offers high-performance smartphones at competitive prices.

brands.name: Sony
brands.description: Sony Corporation is a Japanese multinational conglomerate corporation known for its electronics products.

brands.name: Xiaomi
brands.description: Xiaomi Corporation is a Chinese electronics company that manufactures smartphones, mobile apps, laptops, and related consumer electronics.

brands.name: Oppo
brands.description: Oppo is a Chinese consumer electronics and mobile communications company known for its smartphones and other electronic devices.

brands.name: Huawei
brands.description: Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. is a Chinese multinational technology corporation known for designing, developing, and selling telecommunications equipment and consumer electronics.

brands.name: Nokia
brands.description: Nokia Corporation is a Finnish multinational telecommunications, information technology, and consumer electronics company.

brands.name: LG
brands.description: LG Corporation is a South Korean multinational conglomerate known for its electronics, chemicals, and telecommunications products.

categories.name: Smartphone
categories.description: A category of mobile phones with advanced features and computing capability.

categories.name: Tablet
categories.description: A mobile device with a larger screen, typically used for media consumption, web browsing, and productivity tasks.

categories.name: Laptop
categories.description: A portable personal computer with a clamshell form factor, suitable for mobile use.

categories.name: Smartwatch
categories.description: A wearable computing device that closely resembles a wristwatch or other time-keeping device.

categories.name: Headphone
categories.description: A pair of small loudspeaker drivers worn on or around the head over a user's ears.

categories.name: Camera
categories.description: An optical instrument used to capture and record images and videos.

categories.name: Television
categories.description: A device that combines a tuner, display, and speakers for the purpose of viewing television broadcasts.

categories.name: Speaker
categories.description: An audio device used to output sound to an audience.

categories.name: Gaming Console
categories.description: A specialized computer system designed for interactive video gameplay and display.

categories.name: Router
categories.description: A networking device that forwards data packets between computer networks.
